entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 12:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: ENE 63 km/h gust 84 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
